values.description:
Ideo Technologies is a french consulting company dedicated to J2EE Open Source Web application and software quality improvement.

Ideo Technologies has a deep knowledge of the Open Source technologies and Java J2EE Open standards. Throughout missions with our customers or in our R&D department, our consultants improve their skills on Java development environment. Ideo Technologies releases SweetDEV Solutions which accelerate dramatically the development of Web interfaces. Ideo Technologies promotes Open Source projects such as SweetDEV RIA.

Ideo Technologies built a set of solutions which combine methodology, consulting and support to help customers to improve applications quality. 

As a first class Atlassian Partner, Ideo Technologies customize, configure, install and support JIRA, Confluence and devtools.

After 9 years of steady growth, Ideo Technologies has been trusted by more than 150 customers in France and Europe.
values.name: Ideo Technologies

values.description:
About OpenJaw Technologies

OpenJaw Technologies is the creator of the xDistributor Platform, the world’s most powerful eCommerce platform for the travel industry. 

Our solutions enable leading Airlines, Online Travel Agencies, Hotel Groups and Loyalty Programmes to market, distribute and sell their products online in a differentiated way.

The xDistributor Platform enables travel supplier integration, distribution channel management and dynamic packaging which are controlled by its fully integrated business rules engine. 

Applications that reside within the xDistributor Platform include:

•	xRez – a highly customisable Internet Booking Engine
•	xRezAgent – sales and servicing for call centre agents
•	xHotel – inventory, content and distribution management for accommodation
•	xEvent – content and inventory management for event tickets and destination attractions
•	xLocation – location data and hierarchies

OpenJaw Technologies is a member and active participant of the Open Travel™ Alliance, CASMA, TTI and HTNG.

OpenJaw Technologies is headquartered in Dublin, Ireland, with regional offices in Galway, Madrid, Frankfurt, Oslo and Dallas – as well as representation in Moscow.
values.name: OpenJaw Technologies

values.description:
Software Mind SA is an innovative, globally operating software house that delivers the highest quality own IT products and services for companies in the telecom, financial and banking and energy sectors. The company’s offer covers the provision of its own solutions connected with the implementation of the company’s value building strategy based on effective customer relationship management and multi-volume transaction payment systems. In the area of services the company offers the execution of dedicated IT solutions, deployments in the field of business process management, SOA/EAI implementation, deployment of Business Intelligence & analytical systems, management and organization of software development processes.

Software Mind SA, relying on innovative technologies, becomes involved in the development of semantic technologies and Web 3.0. The Company actively participates in research and development work and leads projects with partners from Western Europe, which enables it to develop strong competencies and its own products. 

Software Mind SA is successful owing to its flexibility in cooperation, high quality of solutions delivered and unique knowledge. The Company has clearly defined values, namely: People, Quality, Products, Innovation, Transparency.
values.name: Software Mind

values.description:

We provide our clients with a full spectrum of software development services performed in dedicated offshore center. InterWorks brings to a client a unique combination of a proven offshore engagement model, high quality, consistent development process, deep technical expertise, world class infrastructure, and sense of teamwork...a combination, which results in on-strategy, on-time and on-budget outsourcing.     Software Development

values.description:
Tricon Infotech, one of the most trusted names in Offshore Software Development, provides software development & support services across the globe in different business models, which includes Fixed Price Turnkey Projects, Time & Material Projects, Offshore Maintenance & Offshore Development Center. Tricon has extensive experience in the technology across a wide range of disciplines, solutions, platforms and languages. Tricon's expertise extends to vertical markets such as:

    * Social Networking
    * Travel
    * Education
    * Healthcare
    * Manufacturing
    * Retail Management
    * Insurance & Finance
    * Media/Entertainment

Tricon's professionals have extensive experience in the following Technologies:

Languages/Technologies: Java, J2EE, EJB, Servlets, JSP, PHP, VB.NET, ASP.Net, C#, XML, XSLT, PL/SQL

Frameworks: Spring, Struts, JSF, jQuery, .Net framework, Liferay, Drupal, Redhat WAF, DotNetNuke

Rich Internet Application Frameworks: FLEX, Openlaszlo

ORM Technology: Hibernate

Requirement Phase Tools: Axure, ErWin

Development Phase Tools: Eclipse, Netbeans, Oracle JDeveloper, Codestriker, Microsoft Visual Studio, Dreamweaver, Adobe Photoshop

Configuration Management Tools: SVN (SubVersion), CVS, VSS, Ant, Maven, Continuum

Testing Phase Tools: Selenium, Jprofiler, JUnit

Project Management Tools: MS Project, Redmine, Bugzilla

Hosting support and monitoring: Amazon cloud, Nagios

Operating Systems: Windows 7/VISTA/XP/2003/2000/NT, Redhat Linux Enterprise Edition, CentOS, MAC

Databases: Oracle, SQL Server, PostgreSQL, MySQL, MS Access

Web/Application Servers: Apache Tomcat, Glassfish, BEA WebLogic, JBoss, I I S

Others: Openmeetings, Lucene, Solr, Hibernate-Search, SEO
values.name: Tricon Infotech Pvt. Ltd

values.description:
OBSS is an open source software company specializing on systems integration and enterprise solutions.

With its expertise in Java technologies, OBSS offers technology services to meet different needs and expectations of enterprises. The services provided include turn-key project development, human resource provision, and consultancy.

With special focus on Java/J2EE middleware technologies, the highlights of the OBSS team’s expertise include SOA, BPM, Ajax and EJB, amongst others.

OBSS is also the developer and provider of the GrayMound Framework which is designed to foster rapid application development by allowing enterprises to focus only on the business logic instead of architectural and technical details.
values.name: OBSS

values.description:
FuseSource, a wholly owned subsidiary of Progress Software Corporation, provides professional open source integration and messaging software, tools, training, and consulting to organizations seeking to leverage these technologies in the enterprise.

FuseSource provides its customers with access to professional open source software through a subscription model.  FuseSource™ subscriptions include certified distributions of Apache Software Foundation projects, professional documentation, enterprise-level support and SLAs, and tools to allow management and metering. As important, FuseSource subscriptions provide customers the ability to influence the product roadmap as well as access to consulting and expertise from open source professionals solely focused on enterprise integration and messaging.  FuseSource offers the following certified Apache distributions:

•   FUSE ESB® – Based on Apache ServiceMix
•   FUSE Message Broker® – Based on Apache ActiveMQ
•   FUSE Services Framework® – Based on Apache CXF
•   FUSE Mediation Router® – Based on Apache Camel
values.name: FuseSource

values: Open Source Application Integration and Messaging

values.description:
A different approach to technology 
Genitech is an international organization including Genigraph, Optech Software, and Genitech Tunisie, with 140 employees worldwide. 

Since 1992 our business has been dedicated to developing complex software applications combining distributed architecture, interactive graphics, optimization, and business rules. 

We are a consulting company providing expertise and solutions for object oriented technology. Our engineers are experts in UML, BPMN, Java, J2EE, C++, Design Patterns, C# and .NET. 

We provide solutions to all levels of the software life cycle including requirements engineering, design, implementation, test, deployment and maintenance. Genitech’s 17+ years of experience in object-oriented technology makes us experts in integrated software packages in several domains: finances, banking, industry, e-services, insurance, and telecom. Ongoing training and certification of our engineers allows our customers to stay up-to-date with fast changing technology.
Product porfolio includes e-Citiz (https://www.e-citiz.com) and AGIR (https://www.softeam.fr/index.php?page=rubrique&id_rubrique=30).

address.street1: Pôle Elgazala des Technologies de la Communication

values.name: Genigraph

values: Business Rules, BRMS, Decision Management, Optimization
